column1: Baby Barnaby's////I didn't find the breakfast to be a total loss since I figured that a bit of time in the microwave would help revive the dish into the consistency it needed
column2: and a bit of hot sauce goes a long way to add flavor. The staff wasn't rude
column3: but they weren't very attentive either. I would say that they were a bit indifferent overall
column5: but not great. I would make a trip back here
column6: but I certainly won't be going out of my way to do so.
